requirements.summary: Remove the 'built with ♥ using caffeine.ai' attribution text from the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: The attribution text 'built with ♥ using caffeine.ai' is completely removed from the Footer component
The footer layout adjusts properly after the text removal without leaving empty space or layout issues
All other footer content (contact details, business hours, social media links, copyright notice) remains intact and properly displayed

file_operations.description: Remove the 'built with ♥ using caffeine.ai' attribution text from the Footer component while preserving all other footer content including contact details, business hours, quick links, social media icons, and copyright notice. Ensure the footer layout adjusts properly without leaving empty space or layout issues after the text removal.
